segments.text: The kitchen looks busy with the sink running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows steadily onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, polishing her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing a dress and apron, very domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy is on a stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping by waiting with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it might give way any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is neat with bushes and a fence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a contrast to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being naughty, but cute.
segments.speaker: PAR
